attributes.action: step in and change the olympic logo to one that the public will back.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a logo which took a year to design and has to help raise £2bn of private money to pay for the running of the Games. It has cost £400,000 to design and has provided nothing but national outcry from the general public.Do the decent thing and give us a logo we can be proud of and not this national embarrassment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
